name: Age Of Conan - Business Style
description:
This style will strip all of the 'gamer' colors and graphics so I can surf AoC at work.

It's pretty plain but no one will look twice to see what you are surfing.

=================================================================

NOTE: This will also work on http://forums.ageofconan.com/
(It's actually very generic and will work on most sites).  I use it for MMO, IGN, Gamers, ...
